infos.value: I have briefly summarized my explanations. If you could check them, it would be most appreciated.
Through victory, you can gain renown and procure various spoils of war that would otherwise be unobtainable. By all means, please join in and give it a try.

• Limited Guild Battles •
Limited Guild Battle Entry will become automatic once the following conditions are met.
Limited Guild Battle Entry will become automatic once the guild <color=#00ffff>has 10 or more members</color> (including the Leader and Sub Leader).
You can use actions to <color=#00ffff>Attack</color> your enemy or <color=#00ffff>Support</color> allies and hinder foes.
Depending on the Guild Battle being held, the <color=#00ffff>number of parties</color> you can create and <color=#00ffff>formation conditions</color> will differ.
Proceed to a tutorial on Limited Guild Battles?
